Bruised dollar wobbles as traders eye US rate cuts next yearThe dollar nursed steep losses on Thursday and was headed for a yearly decline after two years of strong gains as expectations of interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve next year grip markets. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 01:43:21 GMT 7AIDGYKNPBKEJIJ6BZ6L575IH4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/bruished-dollar-wobbles-traders-eye-us-rate-cuts-next-year-2023-12-28/Ankur Banerjee市场货币
Alibaba must face lawsuit in US over counterfeit SquishmallowsA U.S. judge on Wednesday rejected Alibaba's bid to dismiss a lawsuit over the alleged sale by various merchants of counterfeit versions of the popular children's toy Squishmallows on its online platforms. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 20:22:02 GMT 5ASM3FKTLFM2PH35BBMYNRHXUY https://www.reuters.com/legal/alibaba-must-face-lawsuit-us-over-counterfeit-squishmallows-2023-12-27/Jonathan Stempel合法的交易性
China aims to expand domestic demand, ensure speedy recoveryChina will strive to expand domestic demand, ensure a speedy economic recovery and promote stable growth, according to an interim report on China's 14th five-year plan published by parliament on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 12:13:05 GMT CD2V3Y7YMJMQPC7OUMSWC2IJYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-aims-expand-domestic-demand-ensure-speedy-recovery-2023-12-27/Reuters市场宏观问题
India net importer of steel in April-Nov as Chinese shipments reach 5-yr highIndia turned a net importer of finished steel in the first eight months of the fiscal year that began in April with shipments from China reaching their highest in five years, according to provisional government data seen by Reuters on Wednesday. New World and China Resources to build $1.3 bln Hong Kong housing developmentHong Kong's New World Development and Chinese state-backed China Resources Land said they will jointly build a $1.3 billion housing project in the financial city's "Northern Metropolis" next year. BYD has obtained conditional testing license for level 3 autonomous driving on high-speed roadsChinese electric vehicle giant BYD , said on Wednesday it has obtained a conditional testing license for level 3 (L3) autonomous driving on high-speed roads.
